title: Hebrew font on an Israeli online paper... No response from Font ID
content:
Dear Hebrew font designers,  
Let me first apologize for posting on this forum about a font ID issue. I have tried FontID webpage without success. Could anyone please help identify the font in the image. It was found in an online Israeli newspaper. Shalom...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [testcase.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152751/http:/typophile.com/files/testcase_1.jpg) | 561.28 KB |
author: asan

comments.content:
Hey,  
The name of this font is "Hameashen Serif" (The smoker Serif) and it was designed by Danny Meriav AKA "HATAYAS" (the pilot), Who is part of a couple that call themselves "The Guild" or in Hebrew "Hagilda".  
 [http://www.hagilda.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152751/http:/www.hagilda.com/ "http://www.hagilda.com")

You can find the font in here on page 15:  
 [http://www.hagilda.com/gilda\_2008\_web.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152751/http:/www.hagilda.com/gilda_2008_web.pdf "http://www.hagilda.com/gilda\_2008\_web.pdf")

Please no IDs outside the ID area.

hhp
